enquiry-reason.required: Tell us what your enquiry is about

enquiry-reason-other.required: Tell us the topic you’re getting in touch about

contact-preference.required: Choose your preferred method of contact

email.email: Enter your email in the correct format, for example name@domain.com

phone.phonenumber: Enter your phone number in the correct format, for example 020 7946 0937 or 07700 900579

inside-uk.required: Tell us where your organisation is based

outside-uk.equal: Select a country from the list

uk-postcode.postcode: Enter your postcode in the correct format, for example SW1A 1AA

enquiry-description.required: Tell us what else will help us answer your enquiry

exported-before.required: Tell us if you’ve sold products or services to customers overseas

org-type.required: Choose the description that best fits where you work

org-type-other.required: Enter a description of your occupation

sector.required: Enter the industry you mainly operate in
sector.equal: Select an industry from the list

bank-referrer-name.required: Please choose the name of the bank that referred you
